jml.evolution.selections
Class Uniform

java.lang.Object
  jml.evolution.Operator
      jml.evolution.Selection
          jml.evolution.selections.Uniform

public class Uniform
extends Selection

Title: Uniform

Description: The uniform selection operator. In this selection strategy all individuals have the same probability to be choosen

Company: Universidad Nacional de Colombia
